clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: Used in the manufacuring of medicated animal feeds FDA Label

contraindications.disease: The acute oral LD50 in mice is 2314mg kg MSDS The most common adverse effects of tertacylines are gastrointestinal disturbances and staining of teeth and bone Some occurences of dental hypoplasia and bone deformity have been noted T28 In pregnant women tetracyclines may produce hepatotoxicity
contraindications.pharmacodynamics: Tetracycline antibiotics are bacteriostatic agents which act to inhibit bacterial growth and reproduction T28

incompatibilities.description: The risk or severity of renal failure can be increased when Methoxyflurane is combined with Chlortetracycline
Magnesium can cause a decrease in the absorption of Chlortetracycline resulting in a reduced serum concentration and potentially a decrease in efficacy
The therapeutic efficacy of Vibrio cholerae CVD 103 HgR strain live antigen can be decreased when used in combination with Chlortetracycline
Didanosine can cause a decrease in the absorption of Chlortetracycline resulting in a reduced serum concentration and potentially a decrease in efficacy
The therapeutic efficacy of Collagenase clostridium histolyticum can be decreased when used in combination with Chlortetracycline
